title: Pebble strange fluctuations in importing chains segments
body:
Please copy this to the notepad for visibility.

(Edited by @holiman to instead use triple backticks for larger segments of logs / code) 
```

INFO [09-08|10:23:27.346] Imported new chain segment               number=11,308,760 hash=c8ef7f..fdc2e4 blocks=38 txs=6810  mgas=473.943 elapsed=8.142s     mgasps=58.207  age=2y9mo4w   dirty=0.00B
```

I observed 5 minutes of fast sync (5 blk/s) for every 15 minutes of slow sync (0.1 blk/s) using pebble as the backend database. This is expected behavior and if so then what is the underlying reason?
